actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to repeal the provisions relating to Uganda of the Act entitled "An Act to amend the Bretton Woods Agreements Act to authorize the United States to participate in the Supplementary Financing Facility of the International Monetary Fund", approved October 10, 1978.

summary.text: Amends an Act amending the Bretton Woods Agreements Act to repeal: (1) the prohibition against Ugandan imports into the United States; (2) the support for international actions against Uganda; and (3) the prohibition of exports to Uganda.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provisions relating to Uganda of the Act entitled "An Act to amend the Bretton Woods Agreements Act to authorize the United States to participate in the Supplementary Financing Facility of the International Monetary Fund", approved October 10, 1978.
